iiv.display

Interface NumberFormattable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DisplayColorMap, DisplayColorMapQuilt, GotoPointDialog, IntensityProjectionImage, ShowPointDialog, ShowPointDisplayLine, SingleImg

    public interface NumberFormattable
    NumberFormattable defines routines to allow setting number formatting rules for numbers generated and displayed by a component.
    Since:
    iiV1.142
    See Also:
    NumberFormat, CNUDisplay, DisplayComponent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.text.NumberFormat getNumberFormat()
      Gets the number format.
      void setNumberFormat(java.text.NumberFormat numberFormat)
      Sets the number format for converting numbers to strings.

        Sets the number format for converting numbers to strings.
